00003 namespace eztpl;

00005 require_once 'EZException.php';
00006 require_once 'EZFunctions.php';

00011 class EZContext
00012 {
00013   private $name;
00014   private $sourceCode;
00015   private $varList = array();
00016   private $subContextList = array();
00017   private $tempCode;
00018   private $generatedCode;
00019   private $used = false;
00020 
00026   public function __construct($name, $sourceCode)
00027   {
00028     $this->name = $name;
00029     $this->sourceCode = $sourceCode;
00030     $this->parseCode();
00031   }
00032 
00038   public function setVariable($varName, $varValue)
00039   {
00040     if (in_array($varName, $this->varList)) {
00041       $this->tempCode = preg_replace('/\{#' . $varName . '\}/', $varValue, $this->tempCode);
00042     } else {
00043       throw new EZException(6, array($this->name, $varName));
00044     }
00045   }
00046 
00050   public function closeContext()
00051   {
00052     if (!$this->used) {
00053       throw new EZException(8, $this->name);
00054     }
00055     $this->generateCode();
00056 
00057     $this->used = false;
00058   }
00059 
00063   public function init()
00064   {
00065     if ($this->used) {
00066       throw new EZException(7, $this->name);
00067     }
00068     $this->used = true;
00069     $this->tempCode = $this->sourceCode;
00070   }
00071 
00075   public function reset(){
00076     $this->used = false;
00077     $this->generated = NULL;
00078   }
00079 
00083   public function getGeneratedCode()
00084   {
00085     return $this->generatedCode;
00086   }
00087 
00091   private function generateCode()
00092   {
00093     if ($this->used) {
00094       // Replace all unused variables by an empty string
00095       $this->tempCode = preg_replace("/\{#([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)\}/", "", $this->tempCode);
00096       // Generate all children contexts code
00097       if (count($this->subContextList)) {
00098         foreach (array_keys($this->subContextList) as $subContext) {
00099           // Generate the children contexts code and reset them
00100           $text = ($this->subContextList[$subContext]->used) ? $this->subContextList[$subContext]->generateCode() : $this->subContextList[$subContext]->generatedCode;
00101           $this->tempCode = preg_replace("/(\|$subContext\|)/", $text, $this->tempCode);
00102           $this->subContextList[$subContext]->reset();
00103         }
00104       }
00105       $this->generatedCode .= $this->tempCode;
00106       return $this->generatedCode;
00107     } else {
00108       return $this->generatedCode;
00109     }
00110   }
00111 
00116   public function addSubContext(&$subContext)
00117   {
00118     $this->subContextList[$subContext->name] = &$subContext;
00119   }
00120 
00124   private function parseCode()
00125   {
00126     $regexp = "/\{#([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)\}/";
00127     preg_match_all($regexp, $this->sourceCode, $matchedData);
00128     $this->varList = array_merge($this->varList, $matchedData[1]);
00129   }
00130 
00131 
00132 }
